stories.text: Hi, I live in Dhaka, Bangladesh. I have passed HSC (with GPA 5.0). I am looking for an internship (or a part-time job). I am familiar with C, Go, Web technologies and Linux user space. And I have good taste.

stories.text: Im a CS graduate from the US. Iâ€™m in a situation where I can no longer stay in the US and have to move to the middle east. I'm comparing salaries with the US tech jobs its a bit upsetting. I'm looking into Dubai and Jordan. It seems that mostly web engineers are needed. I wish I can work with a US based company remotely from my home country, is that possible for an entry level? If someone can help guide me, I will appreciate it.
stories.title: CS graduate from the US moving to the Middle East, what are my opportunities?
